summary.name: summary
summary.value: Zend_Form with Captcha_Image losing Post data in Internet Explorer (Zend_Locale or Zend_Translation problem)

description.name: description

value.body:
Strange, does this problem persist with current stable release 1.10.2?
This could be an issue related to the encoding of the form as well, there
is an issue about encoding mismatch between Zend_Form and Zend_View [ZF-9334].
